tags: None
review: My go-to dentist! Superb facilities and great staff. I have been consulting with Dr. Shagun for the last couple of years and it has always been a great experience!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Excellent dentist always cordial and done scaling polish of teeth very well thank you
Would definitely recommend

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Satisfied with the treatment done. However, I will suggest to reduce the treatment cost as it is significantly higher as compared to others.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is very nice and pleasant. She takes time to explain the problems and  don’t recommend unnecessary expensive treatment. The clinic is clean and ambience is good. Highly recommend

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Shagun is extremely sweet.. she walks you through the treatment and keeps your comfort top priority... I had a very difficult extraction but she was very sweet and patient with me

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Shagun was thorough and patient. The clinic had a welcoming ambiance. Great experience. Will be my go to.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Excellent both Drs Keyur and Dr Shagun are Superb. They have a very friendly atmosphere and the cleanliness is Par Excellence   ❤️❤️❤️

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Shagun Verma is very gentle and explains everything properly.  *** ** ********* *** I would recommend her to anyone with dental issues. 
Staff is also very helpful and nice. Clean environment.  Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Shagun Verma is a gem, hands on doctor and makes the patient comfortable with her kindness and skills.
Highly recommended!!!
